madhyama sanskruthika aramudale abhayagiri kauthukagaraya magin sanwidhanaya karanu labana 41 wani masika shasthriya deshanaya shri lankawe krushikarmika sabhyathwaye urumaya sandaha wu purawidyathmaka sakshi aacharya ti.aar. premathilaka madhyama sanskruthika aramudale abhayagiri kauthukagaraya magin sanwidhanaya karanu labana 41 wani masika shasthriya deshanaya shri lankawe krushikarmika sabhyathwaye urumaya sandaha wu purawidyathmaka sakshi aacharya ti.aar. premathilaka mahatha adhyaksha, purawidya pashchath upadhi aayathanaya, kolambaa. 2019 juli 25 wani brahaspathinda dina perawaru 10.00 sita 11.30 dakwa anuradhapura abhayagiyi wihara kauthukagara shrawanagaraye di oba samata karanu labana aaradhananayi.
